Contact: mail@tomnomnom.com
Contact: https://tomnomnom.com

# This is another comment
Disclosure: Full

# This field has different casing
acknowledgement: https://tomnomnom.uk/hof
ENCRYPTION: https://tomnomnom.uk/pgpkey

Disclosure: foo
Disclosure: full

Encryption: not a URL
Acknowledgement: not a URL

Contact: +44 7555 555 555
Contact: +44-7555-555-555

Contact: +44-INVALID-NUMBER
